item.title: Internet Archive
item.description: I’ve known The Internet Archive for more than a decade. Serves me a lot of times when references for difficult topics suffered some form of bit rot. Simple to Use Input the URL or domain like what you’ll do in Google or any search engine. Select what year and the circled dates in the calendar would point you to the archived page. Example Say for instance my former employer, Goabroad.com. I was there 2005 to early 2010 and I left traces in the robots.
